Cuba counts on Russians to boost still-ailing tourism sector in 2024Cuba is counting on winter-weary Russians to help boost the Caribbean island nation's ailing tourism sector in 2024, according to the Cuban ambassador in Moscow, after a disappointing 2023 saw visitors numbers fall short of the government's goals. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 20:04:19 GMT 2ZCR5OY3P5PNFHRFQKI22SXPEE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/cuba-counts- Russian-boost-still-ailing-tourism-sector-2024-2024-01-26/Reuters世界美洲
Yemen's Houthis say they targeted oil tanker Marlin Luanda in Gulf of AdenYemen's Houthis said on Friday their naval forces carried out an operation targeting "the British oil tanker Marlin Luanda" in the Gulf of Aden causing a fire to break out. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 19:21:32 GMT HMITV3DDONJHNE3NJEZGJROHNE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemen-houthis-say-they-targeted-oil-tanker-marlin-luanda-gulf-aden-2024-01-26/Reuters世界中东地区
France, Germany, UK condemn Iran's launch of Soraya satelliteFrance, Germany and Britain on Friday condemned Iran's launch of the Soraya satellite last week using the Ghaem-100 Space Launch Vehicle (SLV). Fri, 26 Jan 2024 17:41:43 GMT 4YNH57TW4FPU7PA742XF4V7ZZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/france-germany-uk-condemns-iran-launch-soraya-satellite-2024-01-26/Reuters世界
ICJ ruling: Key takeaways from the court decision in Israel genocide caseThe International Court of Justice (ICJ) ordered Israel on Friday to take action to prevent acts of genocide as it wages war against Hamas militants in the Gaza Strip but stopped short of calling for an immediate ceasefire. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 17:17:42 GMT MMXXMRIURNMMHK5INZQO2LGRNE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/key-takeaways-world-court-decision-israei-genocide-case-2024-01-26/Reuters世界中东地区
Exclusive: Canada to re-start Turkey arms exports after Sweden NATO backing -sourcesCanada and Turkey have reached a deal to restart Canadian exports of drone parts in exchange for more transparency on where they are used, and it would take effect after Ankara completes its ratification of Sweden's NATO bid, two sources told Reuters. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 15:17:34 GMT FGVZIFJ3LZPZTOZ2X4RCWAKZLA https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-re-start-turkey-arms-exports-after-sweden-nato-backing-sources-2024-01-26/Jonathan Spicer世界
Russia's Putin says Ukraine shot down plane, deliberately or in errorRussian President Vladimir Putin said on Friday that a Russian military plane that crashed near the border with Ukraine was shot down by Ukrainian air defences, whether on purpose or by mistake. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 14:24:45 GMT VZMII2AQHNJMBA2AWJ5NVR3E5 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-it-finds-ukraine-ids-tattooed-body-parts-plane-crash-site-2024-01-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Reactions to World Court ruling on Israel's war in GazaThe World Court on Friday ordered Israel to take action to prevent acts of genocide as it wages war against Hamas militants in Gaza, and do more to help civilians, but it stopped short of calling for an immediate ceasefire as requested by South Africa. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 14:08:10 GMT CFHISXUIA5PM5F4DBG2K742L5Q https://www.reuters.com/world/reactions-world-court-ruling-israel-war-gaza-2024-01-26/Reuters世界
UN agency probes staff suspected of role in Oct 7 attacks on IsraelThe United Nations agency for Palestinian refugees (UNRWA) said on Friday it had opened an investigation into several employees suspected of involvement in the Oct. 7 attacks in Israel by Hamas and that it had severed ties with those staff members. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 13:30:38 GMT 3K3ZTHG3BFJ77HZVEHDDX7OU6M https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-palestinian-refugee-agency-investigates-staff-suspected-role-in-israeli-attacks-2024-01-26/Gabrielle Tétrault-Farber世界中东地区
Pope says LGBT blessings are for individuals, not approval of unionsPope Francis on Friday defended a Vatican document on blessings for same-sex couples but said they were not an approval of a lifestyle the Church sees as potentially sinful but of individuals seeking to get closer to God. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 11:45:05 GMT FFWXMCQJIQVI3TIXFZ4B53UU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/pope-says-lgbt-blessings-are-individuals-not-approving-unions-2024-01-26/Philip Pullella世界欧洲
Kremlin denies report that Putin reaching out to US, might drop key demands on UkraineThe Kremlin on Friday denied a Bloomberg report that President Vladimir Putin was "putting out feelers" to the United States for possible talks on ending the war in Ukraine and might consider dropping key demands on Ukraine's security status. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 10:13:07 GMT M5CWXRFPA5LUDKDJTROJSOZ4GQ https://www.reuters.com/world/kremlin-denies-report-that-putin-reaching-out-us-might-drop-key-demands-ukraine-2024-01-26/Reuters世界
North Korea signals confrontation, no signs of war preparationNorth Korea is stepping up confrontation with the United States and its allies, but officials in Washington and Seoul say they have spotted no signs Pyongyang intends to take imminent military action. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 10:10:39 GMT R4ODACIBYJO7XL5NNXCBIMUFXI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-signals-confrontation-no-signs-war-preparation-2024-01-26/Josh Smith世界亚太地区
